meta.description: Optimize the weekly production of laminate planks and carpets to maximize profit under demand and production constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by the company

params.name: demand
params.description: Minimum demand for each product in square feet

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum production capacity for each product in square feet

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per square foot for each product

vars.name: production
vars.description: Production amount in square feet for each product

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from the production of laminate planks and carpets

constraints.name: demand_laminate_planks
constraints.description: Meet the minimum demand for laminate planks

constraints.name: demand_carpets
constraints.description: Meet the minimum demand for carpets

constraints.name: total_shipping_requirement
constraints.description: Meet the total shipping requirement of at least 50,000 square feet

constraints.name: capacity_laminate_planks
constraints.description: Do not exceed the production capacity for laminate planks

constraints.name: capacity_carpets
constraints.description: Do not exceed the production capacity for carpets
